DOC.brief_summary: The purpose pilot study evaluate effect D-chiro-Inositol ( DCI ) oral supplementation addiction folic acid compare folic acid alone glycaemic control assess HbA1c overweight obese T1D patient undergo intensive insulin therapy . A 24 week , prospective , randomize control trial carry T1D patient , age 17-50 year ( 13 male , 13 female ) , disease duration > 1 year BMI > 25 , attend outpatient Endocrinology Diabetes Unit University Campus Bio-Medico Rome
DOC.criteria: T1D patient age 1750 year disease duration > 1 year BMI > 25 learn disability presence chronic condition potentially able influence daily activity ( visual auditory disability , motor impairment neurological orthopaedic problem ) . T1D patient affect diabetic complication pregnancy
